snippet: Mr. Paul took credit in Iowa for a spike in sales for Ms. Clarkson, who had recently endorsed him. But a discount in digital downloads may be the better explanation.
abstract: Mr. Paul took credit in Iowa for a spike in sales for Ms. Clarkson, who had recently endorsed him. But a discount in digital downloads may be the better explanation.

headline.main: Can Ron Paul Move the Charts? Kelly Clarkson May Not Prove It
